title: warlords bloodlust
body: is there going to be any nerf any time soon to this keystone? i mean its literally the only you should be taking on adcs and bruiser top laners, and makes you unkillable in the early stages of the game unless you have a source of grevious wounds.

replies.body: Warlords is about fighting back from 20% hp. All you have to do is get them to 50% hp and then use spells to burst them down. That's often the best strat anyway, stunning and bursting them before they can use the heal summoner spell.
also love how he forgets about how strong fervor of battle is on champs that dont really go below 20% hp, and stay high hp the entire time, tristana, vayne, lucian, ww
so in the case of slippery bruisers like yasuo or jax, people that dont fight like that, and force you to fight their way, how does one kill them without ignite.

You actually can, quite easily.

I've seen plenty of cases where an Illaoi or Darius etc has built it while 0/10/0 and has completely turned the tide of the game because of it.

Especially against comps that include champions like Mundo or Vlad that rely heavily on healing.

Buying a {{item:3123}} guarantees you to win lane against Mundo and Vlad, they have no counter for grievous wounds.
